content: Thunderbone is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderbone.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderbone'.
The content is as follows:
Thunderbone is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
